channel.title: CR Magazine Podcast
channel.description: The CR magazine podcast is about people and progress in cancer.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2011 American Association for Cancer Research
channel.itunes:author: CR Magazine
channel.itunes:keywords: Cancer Research, AACR, Life with Cancer, Surviving and thriving, advocates, advocacy, cancer, Patient, treatment
channel.itunes:subtitle: An offshoot of CR magazine, the CR magazine podcast is about people and progress in cancer.
channel.itunes:summary: The CR magazine podcast is created by the American Association for Cancer Research (AACR), the world's oldest and largest professional organization devoted to cancer research. CR magazine connects all groups of people who are personally affected by cancer, caring for patients and working toward preventing and curing the disease. For more information about CR magazine, visit www.crmagazine.org.

item.title: Surviving and Thriving: Life With Cancer; Ep. 6: A Survivor's Guide to Nutrition and Exercise
item.itunes:author: CR / The Wellness Community
item.itunes:subtitle: Ep. 6: A Survivor's Guide to Nutrition and Exercise
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the show! This is a new series of six podcasts about cancer survivorship produced in partnership by The Wellness Community and CR magazine. This episode offers helpful nutrition and diet advice for cancer survivors. Please visit us at www.thewellnesscommunity.org or www.CRmagazine.org to hear more podcasts and to tell us what you think of the Surviving and Thriving: Life With Cancer series.
item.itunes:keywords: Cancer, Diet, Survivorship, CR, CR magazine, The Wellness Community, TWC, Advocacy, Research, Treatment, Therapy, Caregiver, Healthcare, Oncology, Partner, Health, Doctor, Surviving, Thriving, Life With Cancer, Nutrition

item.title: Surviving and Thriving: Life With Cancer; Ep. 5: Young Cancer Survivors
item.itunes:author: CR / The Wellness Community
item.itunes:subtitle: Ep. 5: Young Cancer Survivors
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the show! This is a new series of six podcasts about cancer survivorship produced in partnership by The Wellness Community and CR magazine. This episode focuses on the unique challenges facing young adults with cancer and several helpful resources available to them. Please visit us at www.thewellnesscommunity.org or www.CRmagazine.org to hear more podcasts and to tell us what you think of the Surviving and Thriving: Life With Cancer series.

item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the show! This is a new series of six podcasts about cancer survivorship produced in partnership by The Wellness Community and CR magazine. item.itunes:author: CR / The Wellness Community
item.itunes:subtitle: Ep. 1: Defining Cancer Survivorship
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the show! This is a new series of six podcasts about cancer survivorship produced in partnership by The Wellness Community and CR magazine. This episode is an overview of the series and explores the many definitions of cancer survivorship. Please visit us at www.thewellnesscommunity.org or www.CRmagazine.org to hear more podcasts and to tell us what you think of the Surviving and Thriving: Life With Cancer series.
